Live Eye Tv began in 2004 as a cable access show in Seattle that focused on filming bands at local venues. Over the years we've put together a pretty nice colletion of footage of local and touring acts.

Watch: Lorelle Meets the Obsolete "What's Holding You" Live @ Chop Suey
Watch: Constant Lovers "Snickerdoodle" Live @ Chop Suey
Watch: The Oh Sees Live @ Vera Project
Watch: King Khan & the Shrines "Shivers Down My Spine" Live in Seattle
Watch: Guitar Wolf Live @ Chop Suey
